body_html: The Slack team looks a bit dead (compared to Keras or even the coursera deep learning slack team). It would be nice to have an official one or have the TF team endorse that one through README/website.
body_text: The Slack team looks a bit dead (compared to Keras or even the coursera deep learning slack team). It would be nice to have an official one or have the TF team endorse that one through README/website.
